alert.note: Alert for Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 6:00AM MST until January 18 at 12:00AM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Periods of snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 2 to 4 inches, mainly above 6500 feet with lower totals above 6000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Southern Gila Highlands/Black Range Above 6500 Feet. * WHEN...Until midnight MST Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.
